item.title: Good Links Never Die
item.dc:creator: josephscott
item.description: We can find these historic details because links have at least a provisional permanence to them. They are, literally, paths to locations. Thanks to those, we can document the history we make, and learn from it as well. – Doc Searls on Why Durable Links Matter The Internet in general, and the web specifically, have […]
item.content:encoded:
We can find these historic details because links have at least a provisional permanence to them. They are, literally, paths to locations. Thanks to those, we can document the history we make, and learn from it as well.

– Doc Searls on Why Durable Links Matter

The Internet in general, and the web specifically, have given people an unprecedented power to both record and erase history.
